name: SECURAMSmartHome
0:
”Alexa,lock the front door”
”Alexa,is the front door locked”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With SECURAM Smart Home skill, you can now interact with the smart lock by voice.
To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your SECURAM account and discover your devices. 
When you use the skill, you need to set names for your locks. 
You can set lock names in the SECURAM app. Then you can lock the door and check the lock status.
To ensure the door cannot be unlocked by voice from outside of the home, we do not allow the command unlock door.
